page.title: 01Introduction to Kinoulton
page.content: Our{Domesday Area}is made up of {farmland}and small patches of{wood- {land.It}includes most of the village of{Kinoulton,}which has its origins in {Saxon}times,and is bisected in a North South direction by the{Fosseway,}a Roman road.The now disused{Grantham {Canal}also runs through our area. Kinoulton is on the edge of the picturesque{Vale of Belvoir}with a distant view of{Belvoir Castle. Although the landscape is dominated by farmland very few farm workers are needed and so present-day Kinoulton is largely a{commuter village}for people working in Nottingham, Leicester and other large towns in the Midlands.
